name: Magical Girl Mayhem
description:
Made in a week for Game Development Workshop 3 at Ontario Tech University.

Play as a magical girl trying to fight against hordes of enemies in this arcade styled bullet-hell.
Every 10 kills  a powerup may drop to help you on your endless battle.

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Shoot

Credits

Alannis Davis (Ace Savaid)

Oscar Espinola

Josh Morgan
